body: "There’s no soca like the soca of your youth": Lisa Allen-Agostini says that's "the reason soca gets 'worse' every year. It’s not the music, darling. It’s you."
original_body: "There’s no soca like the soca of your youth": Lisa Allen-Agostini says that's "the reason soca gets 'worse' every year. It’s not the music, darling. It’s you."
title: Trinidad & Tobago: Songs of Our Youth

sentence: "There’s no soca like the soca of your youth": Lisa Allen-Agostini says that's "the reason soca gets 'worse' every year.
